scripts.ngsw-config: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && node_modules/.bin/ngsw-config www ngsw-config.json
scripts.ngsw-copy: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn cpr node_modules/@angular/service-worker/ngsw-worker.js www/ngsw-worker.js -o
scripts.config:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config -- --environment=dev
scripts.config:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config -- --environment=prod
scripts.clean: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ionic-app-scripts clean
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn run build && yarn ng serve --port 4202
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn run build:prod && yarn ng serve --port 4202 --prod
scripts.start:server:pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn tsc && node --harmony app.js
scripts.start:server:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && node --harmony ./pm2bootstrap.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng build
scripts.build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ng build --prod --stats-json
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng test
scripts.lint: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng lint
scripts.e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ng e2e
scripts.bundle-report: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn webpack-bundle-analyzer www/stats.json
scripts.docs: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn compodoc -p src/tsconfig.app.json -d docs
scripts.docs:serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn compodoc -p src/tsconfig.app.json -d docs -s
scripts.ionic:build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ionic build --prod --release
scripts.cordova:build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:dev && yarn ionic cordova build android
scripts.cordova:build:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ionic cordova build android --prod --release
scripts.cordova:run:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ionic cordova run android --prod --release
scripts.cordova:run:prod:device: cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 yarn run config:prod && yarn ionic cordova run android --prod --release --device
